name: Experience Cloud
description: Salesforce's platform for creating branded digital experiences and communities
justification: Experience Cloud enables organizations to create branded digital experiences for customers, partners, and employees. Analyzing its usage provides insights into how effectively an organization has implemented external-facing or collaborative Salesforce solutions.

indicators.description: Primary objects and configurations that form the foundation of Experience Cloud
indicators.justification: These components represent the fundamental building blocks of Experience Cloud. Their presence, customization, and active use are the strongest indicators of Experience Cloud adoption.

items.name: Network
items.description: The primary object representing an Experience (Community)
items.justification: The Network object is the central component of Experience Cloud. It's impossible to use Experience Cloud without this object. High weight (0.9) reflects this critical importance.

items.name: NetworkMember
items.justification: NetworkMember records indicate active users in the Experience. High weight (0.8) as they directly show adoption by end users.

items.justification: Experience Builder usage indicates investment in custom experiences. High weight (0.7) as it shows commitment to tailored user experiences.

editionJustification: Edition detection is based on feature availability and usage patterns. Features are mapped to the editions where they first become available, with more advanced features appearing in higher editions. This helps identify both the currently licensed edition and potential upgrade paths.

features.Experience Builder: Custom Experience Builder sites are deployed
features.Knowledge Integration: Knowledge articles are available in Experience
features.Topics: Content organization through topics is implemented
features.Single Sign-On (SSO): Single Sign-On is implemented for secure authentication
features.Multi-language Support: Multiple languages are supported in the Experience
features.SEO Optimization: Search engine optimization features are implemented
features.Progressive Web App Features: Progressive Web App capabilities are implemented

findingsJustification: Findings are mapped directly to detected evidence points, translating technical detection into business-meaningful insights. Each finding is phrased to be actionable and understandable by non-technical stakeholders.
